member.name: TOKEN_PRIMARY_GROUP
member.summary: The TOKEN_PRIMARY_GROUP structure specifies a group security identifier (SID) for an access token.

member.name: TOKEN_PRIMARY_GROUP.PrimaryGroup
member.summary: A pointer to a structure representing a group that will become the primary group of any objects created by a process using this access token. The SID must be one of the group SIDs already in the token.
